name: EcoCharge
pitch: A platform offering easy at-home renewable energy solutions.

name: MindfulMeals
pitch: Personalized meal kits focusing on nutrition and mental wellness.

name: HyperLOCAL
pitch: An on-demand delivery network that prioritizes local businesses and communities.

name: iTutorBox
pitch: An AI-driven tutoring platform matching students with qualified tutors worldwide.

name: BetterRent
pitch: A rental marketplace offering flexible contracts and transparent tenant-landlord relationships.

name: Gigify
pitch: Connects freelancers with local short-term opportunities through a location-based app.

pitch: Secure, user-friendly crypto ATMs that bring digital assets closer to mainstream consumers.

name: FitFriends
pitch: A social fitness platform that pairs users with exercise buddies for motivation and accountability.

name: SmartPark
pitch: An intelligent parking solution that guides drivers to available spots in real time.

name: WasteNot
pitch: Connects grocery stores and restaurants with nonprofits to reduce food waste in local communities.
